xxl.core.relational.cursors

Enum SortMergeJoin.Type

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SortMergeJoin.Type>
      • xxl.core.relational.cursors.SortMergeJoin.Type
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<SortMergeJoin.Type>
    Enclosing class:
    SortMergeJoin

    public static enum SortMergeJoin.Type
extends Enum<SortMergeJoin.Type>
    An enumeration of constants specifying the join types supported by this class.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      LEFT_OUTER_JOIN
      A constant specifying a left outer join.
      NATURAL_JOIN
      A constant specifying a natural join.
      OUTER_JOIN
      A constant specifying a full outer join.
      RIGHT_OUTER_JOIN
      A constant specifying a right outer join.
      SEMI_JOIN
      A constant specifying a semi join.
      THETA_JOIN
      A constant specifying a theta join.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SortMergeJoin.Type valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static SortMergeJoin.Type[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Enum

        clone, compareTo, equals, finalize, getDeclaringClass, hashCode, name, ordinal, toString, valueOf

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • THETA_JOIN

        public static final SortMergeJoin.Type THETA_JOIN
        A constant specifying a theta join. Only the tuples for which the specified predicate is true will be returned.

      • LEFT_OUTER_JOIN

        public static final SortMergeJoin.Type LEFT_OUTER_JOIN
        A constant specifying a left outer join. The tuples for which the specified predicate is true as well as all elements of the cursor1 not qualifying concerning the predicate will be returned. The function newResult is called with arguments cursor1.peek() and null.

      • RIGHT_OUTER_JOIN

        public static final SortMergeJoin.Type RIGHT_OUTER_JOIN
        A constant specifying a right outer join. The tuples for which the specified predicate is true as well as all elements of the cursor2 not qualifying concerning the predicate will be returned. The function newResult is called with arguments null and cursor2.peek().

      • OUTER_JOIN

        public static final SortMergeJoin.Type OUTER_JOIN
        A constant specifying a full outer join. The tuples for which the specified predicate is true as well as all tuples of the LEFT and RIGHT OUTER_JOIN will be returned.

      • NATURAL_JOIN

        public static final SortMergeJoin.Type NATURAL_JOIN
        A constant specifying a natural join. The tuples are compared using their common columns.

      • SEMI_JOIN

        public static final SortMergeJoin.Type SEMI_JOIN
        A constant specifying a semi join. The tuples are compared using their common columns. The results become projected to the columns of the first input relation.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        public static SortMergeJoin.Type[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (SortMergeJoin.Type c : SortMergeJoin.Type.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • valueOf

        public static SortMergeJoin.Type valueOf(String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.
        Returns:
        the enum constant with the specified name
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this enum type has no constant with the specified name
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null
